basic.description:
An examination of key issues in comparative politics. Topics will vary from year to year; consult department homepage.
LEARNING HOURS    120 (36L;84P)
basic.subject: POLS
basic.title: Topics in Comparative Politics

extra.enrollment_requirement: PREREQUISITE  (12.0 units in POLS at the 200-level or above) and (a GPA of 2.0 on all units in POLS) or permission of the department.
